author: Alex Michaelides
review: A chilling psychological thriller that keeps readers on the edge of their seats until the very last page.

author: Tara Westover
review: A powerful memoir about a young woman who, kept out of school, leaves her survivalist family and goes on to earn a PhD from Cambridge University.

author: Michelle Obama
review: An intimate, powerful, and inspiring memoir by the former First Lady of the United States, chronicling her life from childhood to the White House.

bookName: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
author: Mark Manson
review: A counterintuitive approach to living a good life, emphasizing the importance of embracing limitations and focusing on what truly matters.

author: Delia Owens
review: A gripping mystery intertwined with a heartbreaking coming-of-age story set in the marshes of North Carolina.

bookName: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
author: Yuval Noah Harari
review: An insightful and thought-provoking exploration of the history of humanity, from the Stone Age to the modern day.
